events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer role and look forward to reviewing your qualifications in detail.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department based on your experience with software development and coding skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will reach out shortly for the initial screening.
The initial screening was completed successfully, with positive feedback regarding your software engineering background and project experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing additional information about your previous development projects.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC with our lead software engineer.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving ability relevant to the engineering role.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit with the company culture and benefits package.
The HR interview went very well, with positive remarks about your communication skills and alignment with the company values.
We have extended a formal offer for the software engineer position, including details about salary, benefits, and start date.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm for joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer and are looking forward to beginning your role as a software engineer with us.
Your onboarding process has started, including setup of development environments and orientation with the engineering team.
The hiring process is officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering department and completion of all formalities.
